short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Virtual Try On: See how clothes look on you before you buy on your favorite clothing websites like Nike, Amazon and more.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Transform your online shopping experience with our innovative Chrome plugin! With Virtual Try On, you can virtually try on clothes from popular clothing websites like Nike, Amazon and Lululemon by simply uploading your own picture.

Key Features:
- Visualize Your Outfits: Upload a full-body photo with your hands straight, and see how the clothes you find online will look on you. This helps you get a better idea of fit and style.
- Mix and Match: Use the plugin to see how new clothes match with items you already own. Perfect for creating complete outfits.
- Great for parents to visualize how clothes will look on their kids before making a purchase.
- Works for tops and pants from various clothing websites. Note: This feature does not support other items like shoes.

General Visualization: This feature is for visualizing how clothes might look on you. It provides a general idea and may not reflect the exact appearance in reality.

Beta Version: This plugin is in beta. It's a side project we are working on during our week-ends. Expect some bugs and funny pictures :) as we continue to improve the experience. 

For Best Results:
- Use a full-body picture with your hands straight at your sides.
- Ensure good lighting and a clear background for better visualization.

Experience the convenience of a virtual fitting room and make more confident online shopping choices with our Virtual Try On plugin. Try it now and revolutionize the way you shop for clothes online!

Enjoy!

PS: Please send us feedback to julien@aikings.ai and tag us on X/Twitter @kalibetre & @julienbarbier42
